Figure 6:The benchmark library included with the Well includes both coarse and fine level metrics. On the left, we can see the model‚Äôs performance in VRMSE across state variables. On the right, we divide the isotropic power spectrum into three bins whose boundaries are evenly distributed in log space and evaluate the growth of RMSE per bin normalized by the true bin energy to examine the model‚Äôs ability to consistently resolve the problem scales.
